revision.text:
This page lists the material provided to help you use SBGN languages in your favorite software.
Abbreviations and names used in the following tables:
* [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Encapsulated_postscript EPS]: Encapsulated Postscript * [http://www.inkscape.org Inkscape]: Effectively an extended (but valid) SVG * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/PDF PDF]: Portable Document Format * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Portable_Network_Graphics PNG]: Portable Network Graphic * [http://www.omnigroup.com/applications/OmniGraffle/ OmniGraffle]:Proprietary tool. * [http://office.microsoft.com/powerpoint PPT]: MicroSoft PowerPoint * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Scalar_Vector_Graphics SVG]: Scalar Vector Graphics
== Reference Cards ==
